sprint_goal: Establish foundational cloud infrastructure and core application shell with basic calculator functionality.
epic_coverage: Infrastructure and DevOps Foundation,Frontend Application Core & UI Shell,Core Scientific Calculator Module
key_deliverables: Provisioned VPC, RDS, and Cognito; Responsive App Shell; Basic calculator with arithmetic and session history.
demo_objectives: Showcase `terraform apply` successfully provisioning resources. Demonstrate the responsive app shell on different screen sizes. Perform a basic calculation and show the history panel.
success_criteria: Core infrastructure is provisioned in dev. App shell is responsive. Basic arithmetic calculations are accurate.
risk_factors: RISK-002: Delays in infrastructure setup blocking future sprints.
mitigation_strategies: Lower capacity utilization provides a significant buffer for unforeseen complexity in Terraform setup. Frontend work can proceed in parallel.
burndown_target: Complete infrastructure tasks by day 7 to de-risk the sprint.

sprint_goal: Automate the delivery pipeline and implement the complete user authentication system.
epic_coverage: Infrastructure and DevOps Foundation,User Authentication & Data Persistence,Specialized Electronics Calculators
key_deliverables: CI pipeline with security scanning. User registration and login functionality. Ohm's Law calculator mode. Backend API for initial data fetching.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate a CI run failing on a security vulnerability. Show a new user registering for an account. Show a registered user logging in and seeing a personalized state. Demonstrate the Ohm's Law calculator.
success_criteria: CI pipeline is functional and enforces quality gates. Users can successfully register and log in. User data is fetched and loaded post-login.
risk_factors: RISK-005: Incorrect Cognito configuration blocking authentication. Complexity of OAuth PKCE flow.
mitigation_strategies: Early integration testing between frontend auth logic and provisioned Cognito pool. Use of a standard OIDC library.
integration_windows: Frontend and Backend integration for authentication on days 3-5.
burndown_target: Complete backend data endpoints by day 4 to unblock frontend login flow.

sprint_goal: Deliver offline capabilities and the foundational custom mode creation wizard.
key_deliverables: Service worker for offline app loading. Offline data queuing and synchronization with conflict resolution. Backend CRUD for custom modes. Frontend multi-step wizard for custom mode creation.
demo_objectives: Load the application with the network disabled. Perform a calculation while offline, go online, and show the data has synced. Create the first step of a custom mode and show the draft is saved to the backend.
success_criteria: Core calculator works offline. Offline data changes are successfully synced upon reconnection. Users can create and save the basic details of a new custom mode.
risk_factors: RISK-003: Unintentional data loss due to faulty conflict resolution. RISK-008: Underestimation of custom modes feature complexity.
mitigation_strategies: Server-authoritative timestamps for conflict resolution. Build an extensible wizard framework that can be added to in later sprints.
integration_windows: FE/BE integration for offline sync and custom mode creation throughout the sprint.
burndown_target: Stabilize offline queueing logic by mid-sprint to allow for extensive testing.
